# `/sys/mfa`

~> **Enterprise Only** – These endpoints require Vault Enterprise.

## Supported MFA types.

- [TOTP](/vault/api-docs/system/mfa/totp)

- [Okta](/vault/api-docs/system/mfa/okta)

- [Duo](/vault/api-docs/system/mfa/duo)

- [PingID](/vault/api-docs/system/mfa/pingid)
